name: Least privilege for admin/root
objective: Ensure privileged accounts have only necessary rights and are reviewed regularly
implementation: Periodic review of admin group membership; restrict direct root logins; use sudo with logging

name: MFA for privileged access
objective: Require multi-factor authentication for all privileged accounts
implementation: Enforce MFA via IAM policies and conditional access

name: Centralized logging and retention
objective: Collect and retain security logs centrally for investigation and audit
implementation: Ship auth, sudo, system, and application logs to central log store for 90 days

name: Patch management
objective: Ensure timely patching of OS and critical software
implementation: Weekly vulnerability scan + scheduled patch windows; emergency patch process for critical CVEs

name: Endpoint detection & response
objective: Detect and contain endpoint threats quickly
implementation: EDR installed on all endpoints with live telemetry to SOC

name: Backups and recovery testing
objective: Maintain recent backups and validate restore capability
implementation: Daily backups for critical data; monthly restore drills

name: Network segmentation & firewalling
objective: Limit lateral movement by segmenting networks and controlling traffic
implementation: Implement VLANs, ACLs, and perimeter firewall rules with change review

name: Vulnerability management
objective: Identify, prioritize and remediate vulnerabilities based on risk
implementation: Weekly scans, risk-based prioritization tied to asset value and exploit intel

name: Encryption in transit and at rest
objective: Protect sensitive data through encryption
implementation: TLS for network transports, disk or DB encryption for sensitive stores

name: Incident response and playbooks
objective: Ensure rapid and coordinated response to security incidents
implementation: Maintain runbooks, conduct tabletop exercises, post-incident reviews

name: Third-party risk intake
objective: Assess and monitor security posture of suppliers and partners
implementation: Onboarding questionnaires, critical vendor classification, continuous monitoring

name: Change management
objective: Control and document changes to production systems
implementation: Require approvals, testing, and rollback plans for production changes

name: Privileged access management (PAM)
objective: Control and monitor privileged sessions and credentials
implementation: Use PAM solution for session brokering, credential vaulting, and session recording

name: Secure baseline configurations
objective: Ensure systems are configured to secure baselines
implementation: Apply CIS/benchmarks via automation; monitor drift

name: Monitoring & alerting coverage
objective: Ensure key events are monitored and generate actionable alerts
implementation: Define detection rules, tune alerts, and maintain escalation paths

name: Cloud governance & IaC checks
objective: Prevent risky cloud configurations and enforce policies via IaC checks
implementation: Policy-as-code pre-deploy checks, drift detection, least privilege for cloud roles

name: Data classification & protection
objective: Classify sensitive data and apply protection controls
implementation: Labeling, DLP policies, access restriction for sensitive datasets

name: Audit readiness & evidence automation
objective: Automate evidence collection to speed audits and reduce manual work
implementation: Auto-collect MFA status, patch evidence, config snapshots and store in evidence repo

name: Business continuity & disaster recovery
objective: Ensure recovery of critical services within RTO/RPO targets
implementation: Documented BCP, DR site or cloud failover, scheduled drills

name: Asset inventory & classification
objective: Maintain an accurate inventory of hardware and software assets
implementation: Automated asset discovery, CMDB reconciliation, tagging owners
